activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10862
activity.text:
> @muzammil-13 I'd not recommend making PRs for issues that are assigned to someone else already. Also do follow the PR template and checklist next time. Ignoring for now since this was a small PR and first time contribution to our org!

Thank you for the feedback, Rithvik. I apologize for the oversight and will make sure to follow the PR template and checklist next time. I appreciate your understanding.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10812
activity.text: Hey @Jacobjeevan @rithviknishad  , I'll work on updating the edit icons from 'l-edit' to 'l-pen' and improve link styling across components. This will enhance UI consistency.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10493
activity.text: I propose implementing a character limit for the phone number field based on the selected country code. This approach would ensure that phone numbers are validated correctly for each country. We can set the character limit dynamically after the country code is selected.
